Class GeoCoordinateLocation

java.lang.Object
com.here.platform.location.referencing.GeoCoordinateLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeoCoordinateHolder, ReferencingLocation, Serializable, scala.Equals, scala.Product, scala.Serializable
public class GeoCoordinateLocation extends Object implements ReferencingLocation, GeoCoordinateHolder, scala.Product, scala.Serializable
A location represented by a pair of geocoordinates.
